data.title: Godzilla (1998), directed by Roland Emmerich, was released on this day in 1998. A controversial film amongst Godzilla fans, it was dubbed...
data.meta_description:
447 likes, 18 comments - kaijuunited on May 20, 2024: "Godzilla (1998), directed by Roland Emmerich, was released on this day in 1998. A controversial film amongst Godzilla fans, it was dubbed “GINO” by film critic Richard Pusateri after its release, and was the subject of much ridicule. In modern day, fans have come out of the shadows to show their appreciation for the film and its unique Godzilla design. Even 26 years later, this film remains a discussion piece. 

#godzillanews #tokusatsufan #tokufans #tokusatsufans #gojira #tokufan #ガメラ #toku #news #kaijunews #toho #kaijufan #tokusatsu #ゴジラマイナスワン #ゴジラ #monsterverse #godzillaxkong #onthisday #digitalrelease #kong #godzilla98 #thenewempire #monarchlegacyofmonsters #kaijufans #godzillafans #kaiju #zilla".
